name: Balls Push Balls - GDU Jam #5
description:
KILL ALL BALLS:

Fly with mouse + LMB

  • WHITE ball - does nothing
  • BLUE ball - multiplies
  • RED ball - kills other balls

You lose if your computer runs out of RAM.

---

If you found this fun, check out our Steam game, which was also born in a game jam a few months ago https://store.steampowered.com/app/1473870/Hell_Loop/ :)
